price: Dõmin Allah Ya sãka wa masu gaskiya da gakiyarsu, kuma Ya azabtar da munafukai idan Ya so, ko Ya karɓi tũba a kansu. Lalle, Allah Ya kasance Mai gãfara, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ بِصِدۡقِهِمۡ وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ إِن شَآءَ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya al-lahu al-ṣādiqīna biṣid'qihim wayuʿadhiba al-munāfiqīna in shāa aw yatūba ʿalayhim inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
